author_ssm: University Archives staff in 1985. Electronic version prepared by Connor Gaudet in 2013.
unittitle_ssm: Records of the Communication Arts Group
abstract_ssm: The collection primarily comprises selected files of Richard Goggin, professor of Film and Television at NYU from 1956 - 1980, donated to the University Archives over a period of just over a year, from December 1980 - January 1982. The collection is of value to researchers looking into the history of film, television and electronic media as an academic pursuit and the origins of the Tisch School of the Arts.
